casebody.data:
CHANDLER
v.
ATLANTIC SCRAP AND PROCESSING, et al. No. 35PA12-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2016. Daniel S. Walden, Winston-Salem, for Chandler, Connie. Duane Jones, Charlotte, for Atlantic Scrap and Processing, et al. Hatcher B. Kincheloe, Charlotte, for Atlantic Scrap and Processing, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of January 2016 by Defendants for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Dissolved by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of April 2016."
